project.name: desktop
project.description: The desktop project handles all desktop related issues of the gentoo distribution.

longdescription.p: The desktop project handles all desktop related issues of the gentoo distribution. This involves both researching the improvements needed for gentoo's use as a desktop as managing all projects that handle desktop related ebuilds.

project.extraproject: Gentoo GNOME project aims to bring the complete and current GNOME Desktop Environment to Gentoo Linux. The main focus is support functional GNOME desktop releases and also the other GNOME applications. In addition to official GNOME releases, we will maintain several frequently used applications that are based on GNOME, such as Evolution and Galeon.
